abstract: Sanofi-Aventis’s chief executive Chris Viehbacher took his case for a takeover directly to Genzyme’s investors in meetings in New York Tuesday, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people who attended.
snippet: Sanofi-Aventis’s chief executive Chris Viehbacher took his case for a takeover directly to Genzyme’s investors in meetings in New York Tuesday, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people who attended.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of the drug maker Sanofi-Aventis,  Christopher A. Viehbacher, took his case for a takeover of Genzyme directly to the company’s investors in meetings in New York on Tuesday, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people who attended.

headline.main: Sanofi C.E.O. Talks to Genzyme Investors
